work-item.field:
Whenever you change the content of a Work Item or a Document, make following thinking process part of your daily work:


1) Ask yourself: Was my change a cosmetic change or did I change the content of the Work Item / Document ?

2) When my change is not cosmetic then use manual suspect save or auto suspect to mark impacted items for consistency review.





Cosmetic changes: typo, formatting, change of an attribute
Content changes: meaning, logic, added some additional reference documents
